body.p:
Grayson Ky May 8th 1862
His Excelllency B Magoffin

Some two years since There was an indictment found in the Carter Circuit Court against Henry S. Veirs & others for Illegal gaming and Judgment was entered against them for twenty Dollars Each the balance of them petitioned your Excellency & had the fine Remitted Veirs having in the mean time removed to the State of Virginia Came back this winter on a visit to his parents and was arrested & had to Replevy the fine has has quit gaming & Become a good Citizen and as his Comrades have all had their fines Remitted and as he is Cured of this most pernicious practice I most respectfully ask your Excellency to remit Said fine against Henry S Veirs

Most Respctfully
your Obt Sevt
J, R, Botts

Carter Cir. Ct
$20. each } Gaming
Henry S Veirs
Issd May 13. 1862.
